website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for those who want sleek, streamlined style or a mirror for smaller spaces.
pros: Stands out for its reflection quality and contemporary minimalist style
Slim size is a bonus for those who live in small spaces
cons: Some users say the mirror needs to be wider to get a full view

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror and a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Its a very good mirror and a bargain for the price. I was worried about it breaking during shipping but I did not have any problems even though the shipping box was dented. It was very well padded inside so I did not have to worry, thankfully. Make sure you note it has a 14.5" stance.....the distance from where the back leg rest and the front of the mirror. I attached a pic to illustrate the stance. Now its not wide, but I figure it does its job and you fit in the mirror anyway so that may simply be an individual preference.
customer_reviews.author: Lil RicoTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love it... and the fact that it stands up on its own is even more awesome!
customer_reviews.author: colbi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to our bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for the price. It's simple and elegant and could fit into just about any style of decor. I kind of expected it to be wider, but after putting it up I think it's the perfect size. No distortions in the mirror. I've gotten tons of compliments on how much it just adds to the room. Buy this! You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: great mirror. pretty solid for the price
customer_reviews.text: great mirror. pretty solid for the price. reflection seems accurate. I included a picture of the backside since someone inquired.
customer_reviews.author: J. Destefano

customer_reviews.title: Good minimalist mirror
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a mirror that is tall enough for me to see the entire length of my reflection in (I’m 6’1”) and yet is still compact enough for my tiny bedroom Arrived in perfect condition- no cracks or scratches. The mirror glass seems to be of beautiful quality. Absolutely no distortion and super clear and sharp. While it’s a sturdy mirror, it’s also very light in weight and I had absolutely no problem carrying it up multiple flights of stairs. Super happy with this purchase ^_^
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror that isn’t distorted at all
customer_reviews.text: Such a great mirror for the money. I haven’t had a full length mirror in so long because they’re usually extremely expensive or distorted... took a chance on this one and it is durable and accurate!!! Love this mirror and I think it will last a very long tjmr
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A nice addition to the bedroom. Perfect for what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Ann Fera

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality. Nice and heavy full body mirror
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Nice and heavy full body mirror. Only complaint was getting stickers Off mirror once it arrived haha. All in all is exactly what we thought it would be and works and looks great in teenagers bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: 4ek7reynolds

customer_reviews.title: No assembly, pretty, full body mirror.
customer_reviews.text: I love that it was well packed, nothing happened to it. No assembly needed, which is something anyone would love 😍. Holds up pretty good and it has a lock In the back to adjust it however you want.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaly

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror for the price. Sturdy and clean looking
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mirror. Not gaudy, fairly tall you can’t change the tilt, but for the price, it’s a nice mirror. It’s not very wide, but it says that in the description. It is portable and not flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: MLoHo

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it looks
customer_reviews.text: The width on this mirror is too small for my liking - I’m 5’1 and just barely fit in the frame while standing (height wise). I will be keeping and it is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Melis

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY DELIVERED CRACKED BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: Totally HUGE WASTE OF MONEY. Was sent BROKEN WITH HUGE CRACK IN THE GLASS. NO INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO RETURN THIS THING. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY AWFUL TERRIBLE DELIVERY BY UPS.
customer_reviews.author: FYP

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: Was good until when impacted it broke into major shards, not shatters. Huge safety concern.
customer_reviews.author: Karina G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mirror
customer_reviews.text: The floor-length mirror is classy, fairly compact, and easy to move if required. I was delighted to find it was as polished as some other reviewers stated. The trim is silver, which matches my decor perfectly. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This exceeded expectations. It is a very nice mirror and it was beautifully packed. With such a fragile item as a mirror, concerns about it arriving undamaged are legitimate. This was incredibly well packed and there's little need to worry that it will arrive in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality mirror
customer_reviews.text: I bought mirrors before and they end up looking like you're looking in a fun house mirror just not good quality and this one is great quality and it's sturdy totally worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: It arrived in great condition, has a very simple hook back assembly ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a narrow full length mirror and this one fit the space perfectly. It is tall enough that I can see my whole image while standing up close. It arrived in great condition, has a very simple hook back assembly and looks great. The only thing that could be a negative is that it is a non adjustable stand, but with the mirror going all the way down to the floor this shouldn't be a problem for most people.
customer_reviews.author: Anne G

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Perfection! Full length slender mirror with sturdy easel stand so you don’t have to damage walls. The shipping box took a beating and was ripped and dented but the mirror was packed well and was in mint shape. No color or shape distortions. Picture perfect!
customer_reviews.author: JMO

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and move as needed.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived well packaged. Easy to stand up and down over as needed. Love the look of the finish and the flexibility of the mirror. Perfect for my needs. Although it says it can be hung up, you need go buy hardware separately.
customer_reviews.author: Booie

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very good mirror, it doesn’t distort the image. I was a little disappointed with the length but I think that’s the price you pay. Still recommended
customer_reviews.author: Camila Chuba

customer_reviews.title: Came with couple of scratches
customer_reviews.text: Love the mirror. Color is perfect and size is great for a full body mirror. Only complaint is that it was sold to me with several scratches on the mirror. Didn't notice when I was picking it up at the post office until I got home. Slight disappointment for an overall great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Space-saver and VERY easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very stylish mirror with a lovely silver frame. The easel feature is easy to set up and so far it seems very sturdy. It's also not very wide, so you can place it in lots of places, and tight corners. It's not too heavy, either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give this more stars but it’s, just okay. My daughter likes it and that’s all that matters. It’s not as solid as I would have liked and very narrow. It is taller than some others, so that’s a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Larsen

customer_reviews.title: but it was wonderfully packaged without a scratch on it
customer_reviews.text: I was worried this might come broken some how, with my luck... but it was wonderfully packaged without a scratch on it. Its beautiful and sleek. Fits perfectly in my room. I moved into an apartment and I was trying my best to not have to put any unnecessary holes in the wall and this was perfect for achieving that. A little on the pricey side for a mirror in my opinion. But the quality is awesome and it doesn't take up a bunch of space. I definitely worth the money. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is a great full body mirror. I have it in the corner of my bedroom and I attached light strips around it. Great mirror for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Needed a narrow full length mirror to fit in corner of my walk in closet. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CindySue

customer_reviews.title: Super slim
customer_reviews.text: Needed a slim mirror for dorm and this made the fit. Also looks clean and modern
customer_reviews.author: geniphre

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My mother in law told me I need this mirror. She said it was “easy set up.” I was expecting I would have to use a screwdriver or Allen wrench. I literally pulled it out of the box and pulled out the standing arm. TA-DA- absolutely AMAZING!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No assembly required
customer_reviews.text: I took this out of the box and set it up where I wanted it to be. Easy.
customer_reviews.author: MsAdinah

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and clear
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing right out the box. Really well packaged too so there wasn't a single crack or scrape and its super easy to fold up, put away or move around because it's so thin and sleek. It's thin so it's not really heavy either but it seems sturdy enough. Overall it's really clear, no warping at all, great purchase especially for a small bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter always wanted a mirror like this. It's as described & perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: I have to pick between seeing my head or my feet. Not really what I was looking for when I bought a full body mirror
customer_reviews.author: Nobody PAJ

customer_reviews.title: Expensive mirror
customer_reviews.text: I used this mirror for more than a year. It’s a very expensive mirror but good quality. It’s not easy to move around due to the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Peace0857$

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable, Sturdy Mirror
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a nice sturdy mirror. The floor stand uses wire bars to hold the stand in the open position. It is steady on the hardwood floor as well as the carpet. It folds to about 1 inch thick, 2 inches at most. I can slip it into a closet if I don't want it in my way. It looks fashionable and fits in any decor that has chrome accents.
customer_reviews.author: L. Beal

customer_reviews.title: Great and compact floor standing mirror
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is elegant, compact and fits the modern design of my apartment. It is narrow and smaller in real life compared to the expectations based on the photos. This could be a plus or a not depending on the location you plan to place this mirror. The quality is good and it is very stable.
customer_reviews.author: DonDrapper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek looking. Perfect for what I needed. So nice it was already assembled and ready to go. Perfect for anyone I think.
customer_reviews.author: t l

customer_reviews.title: Not my jam
customer_reviews.text: It’s meh. I would had rather spent another $50 and got the mirror I really wanted. But here I am not wanting to return this huge mother truckin mirrror, so it stays. The mirror is as described but it’s hard to see the detailed frame. Which is what makes it less aesthetically pleasing, to me. It has that late 90’s belveled chrome look, not my style.
customer_reviews.author: Eggplantmustard

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, good quality, easy to set up. Exactly what I wanted!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackquelyn Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Distorted reflection
customer_reviews.text: I regret buying this mirror because it has gives distorted reflections because of the uneven surface. I would have returned it but it was too heavy to ship back so just kept it. Build quality is good but it fails at its job of ac curating reflecting light, instead would be perfect for a funny mirror house like the one in Enter the Dragon.
customer_reviews.author: Yosarian

customer_reviews.title: A good view
customer_reviews.text: Using Amazon.com, I purchased this mirror mainly because of the rave reviews it had already received. I needed and wanted a good quality full mirror for a small space. This mirror exceeded my expectations. It is attractive, simple lines and sturdy. It is such a simple design, it does not clash in anyway with other decor. I like the fact that it can be easily moved from room to room as needed.
customer_reviews.author: nikokera

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror strong I still dont think it's worth 100 buck
customer_reviews.author: luis

customer_reviews.title: A fabulous mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Firstly the mirrror was superbly packaged to prevent any damage. Was not too hard to open the boxes either. It is a lovely looking well made mirror. Tall enough and wide enough. Does not contort your image. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. Chaudry

customer_reviews.title: Best Floor Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered two of these now we like it so much! One for home and one for college dorm! Great quality and mirror is clear and in proportion. Sturdy and stylish
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Cautious decision to purchase
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror; however, it was received cracked, and a replacement is a challenge to obtain. Also, will the replacement be cracked?
customer_reviews.author: Ma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the quality. Sturdy, solid, and the image isn't warped at all. Came intact and was exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.author: C. C

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in the room. Not to be used with small children around.
customer_reviews.author: Busiestmom

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and nice. Doesn’t take up too much space. Good for small bedrooms!
customer_reviews.author: Zahraa

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror, but, a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Even though it is narrower than most full length mirrors, it is wide enough to see your entire body. It is very easy to move, lightweight, and it looks nice. I gave it only 4 stars because it is a bit pricey for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Dog and Pony Lover

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Mirror came with frame scratched and dented. Not worth the $$$. Hope you have better luck with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jené

customer_reviews.title: Sleek mirror
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy mirror, using it for my hair room in which I braid clients hair. It looks great In the room and I love that it’s a stand up.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror fantastic quality!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this mirror- it’s light weight but sturdy. It doesn’t distort like some of the less expensive brands!! We highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: Great stand-alone mirror
customer_reviews.text: The frame is beautiful. It's thin and light so it fits pretty much anywhere, perfect for small spaces. The frame is beautiful and the angle isn't too dramatic. Assembly is a piece of cake, just open the box, take it out and stick a pin through a hole. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Easiest to set up!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I thought I’d at least need a screwdriver... no!!! Installation was basically nothing! Looks good too! Unfortunately there was a lot of styrofoam used to protect it, as it is fragile, if only there were a more environmental option.
customer_reviews.author: wolfgirlattack

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror for the price. I was willing to spend way more but this came as a package and I didn't have to worry about the hassle of coordinating a shipment in my building. It is a standing mirror but it only takes up a foot or so of space in the place i have it. I think you can mount it also
customer_reviews.author: MPMD

customer_reviews.title: No complains!
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Light weight. Looks good. Though not full height? The angle does allow someone tall to have a full view
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This mirror is fine for what it is
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is fine for what it is. In my opinion, it is rather cheap-looking, so don't be thinking you'll want to display it much of anywhere public. It's more like something to put in a guest bedroom or walk-in closet. That said, it's a mirror. It reflects. It's fine.
customer_reviews.author: happyshopper

customer_reviews.title: This is the design i've been looking for so long ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the design i've been looking for so long. I hope it was a little wider but I dont mind too much cause the style is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Thu Anh Ta

customer_reviews.title: Not bad not great.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice, not as sturdy as I would like, but seems to be ok. Provides a clear but narrow view. Finish could be better.
customer_reviews.author: PugPower

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: So like everyone else I was super hesitant at buying a mirror online and having it shipped but it arrived in perfect condition! Super easy to put together, not a fun house mirror, and definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Baumgartner

customer_reviews.title: Love this mirror.  Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror. The construction is top notch, it stands really well on carpeting and it looks like a quality mirror. I've had so many comments on it from friends who can't believe it was less than $100. Very slim and simple looking. Classy. Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Mirrors are expensive. This is a great purchase. Sturdy good looking full length mirror. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: slides on wood floor
customer_reviews.text: I just broke this mirror because it has nothing to keep it from sliding on smooth flooring. Beware
customer_reviews.author: Joan R. Allman

customer_reviews.title: Very good reflection. Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Very good reflection. Lightweight. Easy to move. The holder in back slips out from time to time, but the mirror has not fallen as a result. Good idea to check that from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: SantaFeReader

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad mirror. Came well packaged
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad mirror. Came well packaged. Stood solid. Just kind of cheap looking for the price. I found a much better and prettier mirror locally and for a cheaper price. I did return it with no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect profile
customer_reviews.text: I like to see myself in mirrors. This floor mirror fits me well. This looking glass has a slim and stylish profile. It fits nicely into any space you position it. The frame and finish compliment any décor.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncookie

customer_reviews.title: it was too small. My daughter is 6'2".
customer_reviews.text: it was too small. My daughter is 6'2". She as able to find a large mirror for $50 at a department store
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: A great mirror. Sleek, small footprint. Fits in any design style. Moves easily.
customer_reviews.author: Stoutie

customer_reviews.title: but therefore gives you a better
customer_reviews.text: it is a steeper angle than expected, but therefore gives you a better view
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adesso Alice Floor Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous. This mirror is just the right size for the small space we needed it for. The minimalist look fits in with our airy white & silver hardware furniture. We got two of them and they came well packed all the way to the Caribbean. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Irie

customer_reviews.title: Love this mirror
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror! Looks very high end. Unlike other mirrors I looked at, it will work for taller people without having to stand very far away- I am 5'10" and can see myself full-length easily.
customer_reviews.author: ABD

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than pictured
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than pictured, since I had only ordered based on previous positive reviews, and am glad I was not disappointed. Package arrived in two days and the mirror was well packaged. Mirror reflection quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Domarys

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Fashionable, the color is beautiful, very stable, I like it very much.The customer service is very good, very patient and prompt to answer and solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren W

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter for Christmas. She finally got around to opening box which has sat in her room since Christmas. Barely got box open and saw mirror qas damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: No assembly required took it out of the box and instantly had a standing mirror!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marinag92

customer_reviews.title: This mirror is beautiful and simple for the price
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would never find a stand-up mirror, new, for less than $100 but here it is. It arrived in one piece so now I can see my whole nasty body, instead of only the upper half. Thank you for that!
customer_reviews.author: asdf

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice - sturdy/heavy construction and packaged securely for shipping. Good price, too! If you don't want to affix a mirror to a door or wall this looks good and gives a great range of view.
customer_reviews.author: sunshinefisher1

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL AND MODERN
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my niece I LOVEIT AND I KNOW SHE WILL TOO.
customer_reviews.author: VeeVee

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect modern mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality mirror. I do wish it was just slightly wider, but otherwise it does the job and has a clean modern look to it! It seems sturdy even on our carpeted bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle Correll

customer_reviews.title: The quality appears good, with a mirror that doesn't distort
customer_reviews.text: It matches the description exactly. The quality appears good, with a mirror that doesn't distort. And I like that it doesn't take up much space. It didn't require any setup, just pulled out of box and stood it up. I thought it was a great deal for the price. Especially considering how many others mirrors were so much more expensive. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: PMC

customer_reviews.title: Slim and sturdy. The mirror is good quality especially for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Slim and sturdy. The mirror is good quality especially for the price. Simple design will fit with most decor but slightly modern looking.
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Floor Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy and well made . It has a modern look but could really go with any decor. I am very happy with it - it is a little more expensive that other floor mirrors but is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, compact and simple
customer_reviews.text: It's very compact, easy to set up, light weight, beautiful mirror. It's simple design suits almost any kind of furniture. Perfect if you want a full length mirror and want to save space in the bedroom. I would definitely recommend this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Unreal

customer_reviews.title: Long, Slender and Clear
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in perfect condition. It stands nice and easy and I like it. Looks fancy. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: C.T

customer_reviews.title: Elegant piece for a small space!
customer_reviews.text: Its a really nice and quality mirror. It is a little narrow as mentioned in the dimensions but very elegant! :)
customer_reviews.author: anastasialempika

customer_reviews.title: Mirror does the job
customer_reviews.text: It works but is stark and does nothing for the decor of the room. Sorry I didm't hold out for a more decorative mirror, but this one was a good price and very practical.
customer_reviews.author: Faye Girsh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Floor Length Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is perfect for any room in your house. It is a great size (not too big and not too small) and is a quality item. When I received the mirror I was surprised by how well it was made, it looks like it should be 2 - 3 times the price. It has a very sleek design that goes well with any room style (contemporary or transitional). If you are looking for a great standing floor length mirror, I would definitely recommend this one because you will not be disappointed by the quality and the value for your dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen

customer_reviews.title: Nice silver color (not "champagne" as other sites may say)
customer_reviews.text: Solid stable mirror. Nice silver color (not "champagne" as other sites may say). Keep in mind they do mean the left and right bevels are larger than the top and bottom of the frame.
customer_reviews.author: F.M.A..C

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to wall-mounted mirror
customer_reviews.text: After living many years in a house without a full-length mirror, I finally found this one. Looks great, is narrow enough to fit in a small space, and looks good with almost any decor.
customer_reviews.author: G Force

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: i know the dimensions are posted, but wish it was just a little wider
customer_reviews.author: Sirenyard

customer_reviews.title: It is useful, and even fits tall guys
customer_reviews.text: Clear glass. It stands up. It does seem a bit narrow compared to what you might see in a lot of stores. It is useful, and even fits tall guys.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Nice and simple contemporary full length mirror
customer_reviews.text: Nice and simple contemporary full length mirror. Would have given 5 stars but the back prong pieces that keep the mirror upright are always coming out of place causing the mirror to slip and fall. Because it is metal I was able to bend it around a bit to keep it And keep it from slipping. Overall good piece but construction could be better
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Polasek

customer_reviews.title: Great Slim Full Length Floor Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in the small space in my bedroom and gives me the view I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: if there is a women in you life get her one and make her happy.
customer_reviews.text: Another product that my wife loves. Us guys probably will rarely or never use it. However, if there is a women in you life get her one and make her happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Hladek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror. Super flattering. Makes you look sexier than you really are because of the way it's angled ;D
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: I can see me!
customer_reviews.text: Very good floor length mirror. Packaged well clean and not a crack. Good size.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but wish it was wider
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new full-sized mirror for my apartment and did not want the hassle of mounting one on the wall. The mirror came on time and was packaged well. All I had to do was adjust some pins and it was ready to go. I just wish it was a little wider.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect condition. Slim
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition. Slim, attractive, barely there so it's very nice for a small room or tight space.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Fairest of them all
customer_reviews.text: I now have this mirror in my walk in closet - it looks modern, provides an excellent image, is compact and has a higher quality, substantial feel to it. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Awkward and too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Very awkward and way too narrow. Not sturdy enough to be a stand-up mirror. Very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D. Sloop

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the Cost
customer_reviews.text: Based on the low price, this is a good mirror. Small, but as expected.
customer_reviews.author: DianneSalcedo

product_meta.title: Adesso Alice Simple, Modern Full Length Mirror with Brushed Steel Folding Frame
product_meta.description: Color:SteelThe Alice Floor Mirror by Adesso is a stand-up floor mirror ideal for your bedroom or walk-in closet. The powder-coated champagne steel finish adds a perfect touch that will compliment any style of décor. Simply open the box, un-fold the frame and set it up!
feature_bullets: This full view mirror is perfect for capturing head to toe and providing natural light
